1 #ifndef SF_CARDINAL_H
2 #define SF_CARDINAL_H 1
3 
4 #include <emsr/fp_type_util.h>
5 #include <emsr/detail/sf_cardinal.tcc>
6 
7 namespace emsr
8 {
9 
10  // Sinus cardinal functions
11 
12  /**
13  * Return the sinus cardinal function @f$ sinc_\pi(x) @f$
14  * for real argument @c x.
15  * The sinus cardinal function is defined by:
16  * @f[
17  * sinc(x) = \frac{sin(x)}{x}
18  * @f]
19  *
20  * @tparam Tp The real type of the argument
21  * @param x The argument
22  */
23  template<typename Tp>
24  inline emsr::fp_promote_t<Tp>
25  sinc(Tp x)
26  {
27  using type = emsr::fp_promote_t<Tp>;
28  return emsr::detail::sinc<type>(x);
29  }
30 
31  // Normalized sinus cardinal functions
32 
33  /**
34  * Return the reperiodized sinus cardinal function @f$ sinc(x) @f$
35  * for real argument @c x.
36  * The normalized sinus cardinal function is defined by:
37  * @f[
38  * sinc_\pi(x) = \frac{sin(\pi x)}{\pi x}
39  * @f]
40  *
41  * @tparam Tp The real type of the argument
42  * @param x The argument
43  */
44  template<typename Tp>
45  inline emsr::fp_promote_t<Tp>
46  sinc_pi(Tp x)
47  {
48  using type = emsr::fp_promote_t<Tp>;
49  return emsr::detail::sinc_pi<type>(x);
50  }
51 
52  // Unnormalized hyperbolic sinus cardinal functions
53 
54  /**
55  * Return the hyperbolic sinus cardinal function @f$ sinhc_\pi(x) @f$
56  * for real argument @c x.
57  * The sinus cardinal function is defined by:
58  * @f[
59  * sinhc_\pi(x) = \frac{\sinh(x)}{x}
60  * @f]
61  *
62  * @tparam Tp The real type of the argument
63  * @param x The argument
64  */
65  template<typename Tp>
66  inline emsr::fp_promote_t<Tp>
67  sinhc_pi(Tp x)
68  {
69  using type = emsr::fp_promote_t<Tp>;
70  return emsr::detail::sinhc_pi<type>(x);
71  }
72 
73  // Normalized hyperbolic sinus cardinal functions
74 
75  /**
76  * Return the normalized hyperbolic sinus cardinal function @f$ sinhc(x) @f$
77  * for real argument @c x.
78  * The normalized hyperbolic sinus cardinal function is defined by:
79  * @f[
80  * sinhc(x) = \frac{\sinh(\pi x)}{\pi x}
81  * @f]
82  *
83  * @tparam Tp The real type of the argument
84  * @param x The argument
85  */
86  template<typename Tp>
87  inline emsr::fp_promote_t<Tp>
88  sinhc(Tp x)
89  {
90  using type = emsr::fp_promote_t<Tp>;
91  return emsr::detail::sinhc<type>(x);
92  }
93 } // namespace emsr
